datapath

Class TrafficWatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • datapath.TrafficWatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TrafficWatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is for the DPSS service to monitor each router and to watch for the specified traffic flow

            ConnectionList connections,
            LogBox _logBox,

            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> devices,
            java.lang.String _protocol,

            int _destPort)
        Constructor for the Traffic watch object
        Parameters:
        nodes - - reference to the NodeList object
        connections - - reference to the ConnectionList object
        _logBox - - reference to the Logbox object
        browser - - reference to the Browser object
        devices - - ArrayList of the IP addresses of each router in the network
        _protocol - - String of the protocol to watch for
        _sourceIP - - String of the source IP Address
        _sourcePort - - (int) of the source port number
        _destIP - - String of the destination IP Address
        _destPort - - (int) of the destination port number
